attributes.review: This app is a disgrace! I thought my family and I could find some interesting information on this app but when I opened it I found NUDE PICTURES OF DONALD TRUMP! I cannot believe this app exists and that they advertise it as a political campaign! I had to explain to my eight year old daughter and six year old son what a micropenis was tonight. Horrifying.
